items: With Tartare Sauce - Tender, flaky hake fillet served with a classic tangy tartare sauce, offering a light and refreshing seafood option.
Lemon Butter / Garlic Butter or Portuguese - Succulent calamari prepared in your choice of three delightful styles: zesty lemon butter, rich garlic butter, or spicy Portuguese-style seasoning.
Salmon, Feta and Avocado - A vibrant salad featuring fresh, flaky salmon, creamy feta cheese, and buttery avocado, creating a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

With Figs and Blue Cheese or Feta Cheese - A quintessentially South African salad combining traditional biltong with sweet figs and your choice of tangy blue cheese or creamy feta, offering a unique culinary experience.
With a Sauce of Your Choice - A perfectly grilled 200g sirloin steak accompanied by a sauce tailored to your preference, ensuring a personalized dining experience.
Cheese or Mushroom Sauce - Crispy crumbed chicken schnitzel served with either a rich cheese sauce or a savory mushroom sauce, a classic comfort food option.
Cubes of Beef with Hot Peri-Peri - Tender beef cubes simmered in a fiery peri-peri sauce, delivering a bold and spicy South African-inspired dish.
Potato Curry - A hearty vegetarian curry featuring tender potatoes in a rich, aromatic sauce, providing a comforting and flavorful meal.
Toor Palak Dahl - A nutritious and flavorful curry combining lentils, spinach, and split peas, showcasing the depth of Indian vegetarian cuisine.
Mushroom Stroganoff - A creamy vegetarian dish with exotic mushrooms simmered in coconut cream, offering a luxurious plant-based option.
Jack Black/Castle Light - A refreshing draft beer from a selection of popular local and craft breweries.
300ml Softdrink - Your choice of chilled soft drink to complement your meal.
Glass Red/White Wine - A carefully selected glass of red or white wine to enhance your dining experience.
